name: Twilio Voice Caller
description: Make a voice call using Twilio API. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

from axiestudio.inputs import MessageTextInput, DropdownInput, FileInput, StrInput, SecretStrInput

from twilio.rest import Client

"""

    ("ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ª United Arab Emirates (+971)", "+971"),
    ("ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ United Kingdom (+44)", "+44"),
    ("ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ United States (+1)", "+1"),
    ("ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¾ Uruguay (+598)", "+598"),
    ("ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ Uzbekistan (+998)", "+998"),
    ("ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡º Vanuatu (+678)", "+678"),
    ("ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡¦ Vatican City (+39)", "+39"),
    ("ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡ª Venezuela (+58)", "+58"),
    ("ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡³ Vietnam (+84)", "+84"),
    ("ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡ª Yemen (+967)", "+967"),
    ("ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡² Zambia (+260)", "+260"),
    ("ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¼ Zimbabwe (+263)", "+263")]

    inputs = [
        StrInput(
            name="account_sid",
            display_name="Account SID",
            info="Your Twilio Account SID.",
        ),
        SecretStrInput(
            name="auth_token",
            display_name="Auth Token",
            info="Your Twilio Auth Token.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="from_number_country_code",
            display_name="Country",
            options=[country for country, code in country_options],
            info="Select the sender's country.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="from_number",
            display_name="From Number",
            info="Please enter the recipient's phone number without the country code (e.g., '999999999').",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="to_number_country_code",
            display_name="Country",
            options=[country for country, code in country_options],
            info="Select the recipient's country.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="to_number",
            display_name="To Number",
            info="Please enter the recipient's phone number without the country code (e.g., '999999999').",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="url",
            display_name="Voice URL",
            info="Please provide a public URL to an audio file that you would like to use as the voice for your calls.",
            value="http://demo.twilio.com/docs/voice.xml",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Call SID", name="call_sid", method="call"),
    ]

    def call(self) -> Data:
        account_sid = self.account_sid
        auth_token = self.auth_token
        from_number_country_code = dict(self.country_options).get(self.from_number_country_code, "")
        from_number = self.from_number
        to_number_country_code = dict(self.country_options).get(self.to_number_country_code, "")
        to_number = self.to_number
        url = self.url
        
        full_from_number = f'{from_number_country_code}{from_number}',
        full_to_number = f'{to_number_country_code}{to_number}',

        client = Client(account_sid, auth_token)
        call = client.calls.create(
            url= url,
            from_= f'{full_from_number}',
            to= f'{full_to_number}',

        )

        self.status = f'Called to {full_to_number}'

        return Data(data={"call_sid": call.sid})
code.name: code

from_number.name: from_number
from_number.info: Please enter the recipient's phone number without the country code (e.g., '999999999').

to_number.name: to_number
to_number.info: Please enter the recipient's phone number without the country code (e.g., '999999999').

url.name: url
url.info: Please provide a public URL to an audio file that you would like to use as the voice for your calls.

    inputs = [
        StrInput(
            name="account_sid",
            display_name="Account SID",
            info="Your Twilio Account SID.",
        ),
        SecretStrInput(
            name="auth_token",
            display_name="Auth Token",
            info="Your Twilio Auth Token.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="from_number_country_code",
            display_name="Country",
            options=[country for country, code in country_options],
            info="Select the sender's country.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="from_number",
            display_name="From Number",
            info="Please enter the recipient's phone number without the country code (e.g., '999999999').",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="to_number_country_code",
            display_name="Country",
            options=[country for country, code in country_options],
            info="Select the recipient's country.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="to_number",
            display_name="To Number",
            info="Please enter the recipient's phone number without the country code (e.g., '999999999').",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="url",
            display_name="Voice URL",
            info="Please provide a public URL to an audio file that you would like to use as the voice for your calls.",
            value="http://demo.twilio.com/docs/voice.xml",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Call SID", name="call_sid", method="call"),
    ]

    def call(self) -> Data:
        account_sid = self.account_sid
        auth_token = self.auth_token
        from_number_country_code = dict(self.country_options).get(self.from_number_country_code, "")
        from_number = self.from_number
        to_number_country_code = dict(self.country_options).get(self.to_number_country_code, "")
        to_number = self.to_number
        url = self.url
        
        full_from_number = f'{from_number_country_code}{from_number}',
        full_to_number = f'{to_number_country_code}{to_number}',

        client = Client(account_sid, auth_token)
        call = client.calls.create(
            url= url,
            from_= f'{full_from_number}',
            to= f'{full_to_number}',

        )

        self.status = f'Called to {full_to_number}'

        return Data(data={"call_sid": call.sid})
code.name: code

from_number.name: from_number
from_number.info: Please enter the recipient's phone number without the country code (e.g., '999999999').

to_number.name: to_number
to_number.info: Please enter the recipient's phone number without the country code (e.g., '999999999').

url.name: url
url.info: Please provide a public URL to an audio file that you would like to use as the voice for your calls.

node.description: Make a voice call using Twilio API.
